App

Class AccountAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • App.AccountAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasUser

    public class AccountAccess
extends java.lang.Object
implements HasUser
    Class that handles User account. Responsible for creating/saving/loading account Note: User data is only saved to file on logout. any unsaved info on improper exit will be lost

    • Method Detail

      • Login

        public CurrentUser Login(java.lang.String userName,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Allow user to login. acts as builder pattern for CurrentUser Objects.
        Parameters:
        userName - name that user inputs
        password - password that user inputs
        Returns:
        CurrentUser object containing users calendars, inbox, and other user's data

      • createNewAccount

        public CurrentUser createNewAccount(java.lang.String userName,
                                    java.lang.String passWord,
                                    java.lang.String calendarName)
        Allow user to create a new account
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name of this new account
        passWord - The password of this new account
        calendarName - The name of the first calendar of this new account
        Returns:
        CurrentUser object containing users calendars, inbox, and other user's data

      • deleteCurrentUserAccount

        public void deleteCurrentUserAccount(java.lang.String uId)
        Allow user to delete current account
        Parameters:
        uId - the User account to delete identified by Id

      • logOut

        public void logOut(CurrentUser user)
        Logs user out and saves current state to file.
        Parameters:
        user - the current user to logout.

      • hasUser

        public boolean hasUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Look for the given user in userManager
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        userName - the name of user to search
        Returns:
        whether the userManager contains this user

      • addCalendar

        public void addCalendar(CalendarInterface cal,

        Parameters:
